title: Bella Vista 2 Bedroom with Parking in Meredith Catchment
description:
Nicely updated and well-appointed three story, 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath brick townhome located on one of the prettiest tree canopied blocks in Bella Vista is now for rent. Enter into the foyer area w/a coat closet and you'll immediately see through the Living Room and large glass sliders to the inviting Outdoor Patio space.
The living room features beautiful hardwood floors with a wood burning Fireplace and well-placed decorative wall sconces for added lighting. Lower level is home to a nice size Eat-in Kitchen with ceramic tile floors, maple wood cabinets, lots of countertop prep space, gas cooking and white appliance package. There is also a convenient half bathroom and laundry with a storage closet on this level.
2nd floor offers a Guest Suite with a big closet, updated 3-piece bathroom and a hall closet. This bedroom provides access to the Deck through glass slider doors that allow an abundance of south-facing natural light to warm the space. 3rd floor is the Owners Suite w/high ceilings, large wall-length closet, and added storage above. The ensuite bath has a tiled shower and corner sink making efficient use of the space.
Dedicated one car off street PARKING included with rent, located a half block away at 8th and Kater. Perfectly located inside the Meredith catchment on a block with a true sense of community, near numerous parks, Whole Foods, great restaurants, and everything living in the city has to offer.

title: Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renova
description:
Inspired from the town of Tulum, Vesset Capital Partners brings you a tranquil and trendy renovation. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! This home is light-filled and contemporary with an eye-catching facade, custom wooden slat staircase, hardwood flooring, exposed brick accent walls, and a spacious back patio with in-ground garden beds. A bright open floor plan greets you as you enter the home, and the slatted wood staircase really defines the living room and gives a boho vibe. Heading past the living room you'll find a dining space, half bath with barn door and stylist wall paper and an eat-in kitchen. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, two toned flat panel cabinets, black cabinet pulls and faucet, quartz countertops, marble backsplash, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a 6-range burner and a smart fridge. The dining room and kitchen feel fresh and airy with south-facing windows and access to the back patio with garden beds and modern privacy fencing. Head to the second floor for 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The two nicely sized bedrooms feature great closet space and natural and recessed lighting. The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? The fully finished basement is ideal for an additional living area, playroom, gym, or home office with storage along with a washer/dryer. This GRADUATE HOSPITAL location is amazing. You have groceries, fitness, parks, hot spot cafes, and restaurants all within walking distance. Sprouts Farmers Market, Dock Street Brewing, L’Anima BYO, Target, Marian Anderson Recreation Center, Schuylkill River Boardwalk, Fitzwater Street Philly Bagels, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, and more are within a mile of home. Plus, access to major highways, public transportation, and Center City is easy. Want to see this in person? Schedule your showing today!
1516 Montrose St

title: LIVE AT PARK TOWNE PLACE APT HOMES IN CENTER CITY PHILADELPHIA!!
description:
You will be close to Rittenhouse Square and Logan Square's nightlife hubs. The condo includes walk-in closets, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, in-unit washers, and dryers. A variety of floor plans are available, all with breathtaking city and museum views! Gourmet coffee, tea, and other items can be found at Mainstreet Market and Cafe. A fitness centre with Technogym machines, a boxing gym, a yoga/spin studio, and indoor and outdoor exercise areas. The largest pools in Philadelphia, an art studio, a fitness centre with a boxing gym and a yoga/spin studio, a social lounge with a demonstration kitchen, a gourmet market and cafe, an outdoor lounge with a fire pit, a 24-hour concierge, package acceptance around-the-clock, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City, and more can all be found there. Consider using Whole Foods, which is conveniently located a block away, as your second kitchen. title: Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden!
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!

title: Furnished apartment for rent
description:
Hello! I’m looking for someone to rent my semi-furnished two bedroom apartment. I've lived here for 12 years and looking for a respectful person or couple to watch over my place for up to 6-months, with a potential month-to-month extension.
Located near the intersection of Parrish and Bucknell Streets. Second floor apartment in a three unit building above a yoga studio.
There are two bedrooms, both are shown in the photos. One is set up as a bedroom and the second as an office.
There is a private roof deck with a propane grill and garden (if you're willing to care for it!). Bike storage/ mini garage downstairs below the deck.
Full kitchen with gas stove & disposal, Fios wifi/ TV/ Sonos speakers/ smart lighting. Lots of plants & art.
The apartment is located above a barre / yoga studio and you can sometimes hear music during their classes throughout the day.
Location:
Two blocks from the Girard trolley. Two blocks from 48, 49, 15, 7, and 33 busses. 15-minute walk to Whole Foods and the Kelly Drive side of Fairmount Park. 15-minute bike ride to Drexel, 10 minutes to Temple, 18 minutes to Penn.
* Please respond with a link to a social media account. There are too many scammers on here, so I want to be able to verify you're real and actually interested.
Rent is $1550 + utilities / month. Available in March 1!

description:
Sunny, studio apartment becoming available in mid-May for $950! Apartment features kitchenette w/ microwave, large windows and 9 ft. ceilings. Ask about our NO SECURITY DEPOSIT program!! Cats are welcome (add'l fee)! All apartments are rented unfurnished.
Chancellor Apartments is a convenient high rise apartment community in an amazing location in Center City. We are close to most major schools and universities, public transportation, historical attractions, shopping, restaurants and theaters. Center City at its best!!
Rent includes: heat, hot/cold water, 24-hour front desk attendant, free bike storage room, package acceptance service, 24-hour emergency maintenance service, on-site smart card laundry plus card access system and BuildingLink resident services portal access for all residents.
The Chancellor boasts several different studio and one bedroom floor plans. Apartments feature high ceilings, large bright windows, ceiling fans in most units, hardwood floors and breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline and Delaware River. Many apartments have large walk-in closets, too!
We have partnered with Optimal Sport Health Club to offer a generous discounted gym membership (we pay your initiation fee!). There are several off street parking lots and garages in the area, too!

description: Smack-dab between Ridge Ave and Main Street Manayunk, 484 Shurs is the perfect home for anyone looking to get the most bang for their buck. title: One Bedroom  On Site Washer & Dryer
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
-Smoke-free apartments available
-This is a cat friendly community
-Professional on-site management team
-Elevator building
-Garage and parking lot available
-On site washer and dryer
-24/7 emergency maintenance service
-Listed on the National Historic Register
-New fitness center

-Spacious floor plans with large bedrooms and closets
-Modernista Apartment kitchens with stainless steel appliances available

description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.

The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

title: Microsuite, Hardwood Floors, New Fitness Center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
-Professional on-site management team
-New fitness center
-Elevator building
-Listed on the National Historic Register
-Spacious floor plans with large bedrooms and closets
-Seasonal Bike Share Program
-Garage and parking lot available
-Smoke-free apartments available
-Modernista Apartment kitchens with stainless steel appliances available
-24/7 emergency maintenance service
-This is a cat friendly community
-On site washer and dryer

title: Rittenhouse Square Studio Apt Home, Package Room, Near Grocery Stores
description:
This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home at 806 on the 8th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers such as BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as March 20, 2023!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Di Bruno Bros., Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Maxx's Produce, Food & Friends, Spruce Food Market, and Reading Terminal Market. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Harp & Crown, Pietro's, a.kitchen, Veda, The Continental Mid-town, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, and Spice Finch. Buy a loaf of bread at Metropolitan Bakery. Relax with a manicure at Fleur d'Or Nail Bar & Art. This building is close to the theaters on the Avenue of the Arts. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 8th floor
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
* Large north-facing windows with city skyline view
* Renovated kitchen with granite counters
* Gas stove

* Neutral carpet

* Fitness center
